flawed_nl_solution:
Earl was on the 1 + 5 = <<1+5=7>>7th floor after going up 5 floors.
When he went down 2 floors, he was on the 7 - 2 = <<7-2=5>>5th floor.
Since he went up 7 floors, he was then on the 5 + 7 = <<5+7=12>>12th floor.
Since he is 9 floors away from the top of the building, therefore the building has 12 + 9 = <<12+9=21>>21 floors.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
